```{r}

ames <- filter(ames, Lot.Area <= 4000 , na.rm = TRUE)
amesRed <- data.frame(Gr.Liv.Area=ames$Gr.Liv.Area,
                      Lot.Area=ames$Lot.Area,
                      Overall.Cond=ames$Overall.Cond,
                      SalePrice=ames$SalePrice
                      )
```
```{r}
set.seed(110)

sample <- sample(c(TRUE,FALSE),nrow(amesRed),replace = TRUE, prob = c(0.8,0.2))

```

```{r}
model <- lm(SalePrice ~ Gr.Liv.Area+Lot.Area+Overall.Cond,data =  train )
```
